name: Cranky Redcoats
description:
• WASD : move camera
  • Right mouse : rotate camera
  • Left mouse : drag unit positions
  • 1234567890 : control unit
  • Spacebar : cancel orders
  • Left shift : charge!
  • Left ctrl : defend!
  • F : fire!
  • R : return to free camera
  • C : cinematic mode
Cranky Redcoats

An unholy fusion of Landfall's Totally Accurate Battle Simulator and CA's Total War: Empire, Cranky Redcoats is a fast-paced real-time strategy/survival game with huge explosions and unrealistically fast musket reload times. 

Prepare to experience:
  • British, French, and German armies fighting themselves!
  • Increasingly dangerous waves of soldiers, farmers, and tribespeople!
  • Occasional jokes and puns, accompanied by the groans of nearby soldiers!
  • Terrifying naval artillery strikes!
  • Belligerent farmers throwing torches and bricks!
  • Brute-force resource collection and colony management!
  • Mortars and howitzers blasting through fortress walls!
  • Natives of ambiguous cultural origin!
Command and destroy the following units:
  • Redcoats with terrible aim!
  • Green Jackets with slightly more accurate rifles!
  • Pikemen who value their legacy and heritage!
  • Officers with profoundly uninspiring battle speeches!
  • Frenchmen who yell "Retreat!" while in combat!
  • Hessians voice-acted by someone who doesn't speak German!
  • Extremely low-effort horses and cavalrymen!
  • Overpowered grenadiers!
  • Cannon and howitzer carriages!
  • Puckle shotguns!
  • Farmer miniboss: farmer with two MP-40 submachine guns!
  • Native miniboss: statue of the great lord Ho-Chunk himself!
  • . . . and several others which I have forgotten!

Disclaimer: This game is very early along in development! Feedback is welcome and will be incorporated into future iterations of this concept.
